sen.j: 山岡 景之（やまおか かげゆき）は、戦国時代 (日本)の武将。
sen.e: Kageyuki YAMAOKA is a military commander of the Sengoku period (period of warring states).
Kageyuki YAMAOKA was a military commander of the Sengoku period (period of warring states).
Kageyuki YAMAOKA was a military commander of the Sengoku period (period of warring states).
He was a senior vassal of Rokkaku clan.
He was the senior vassal of Rokkaku clan.
sen.cmt: the senior vassal の方が良いと思います。
sen.e: He was the senior vassal of Rokkaku clan.

sen.j: 南近江の志賀郡、栗太郡を代々治める山岡家の当主。
sen.e: He was a head of Yamaoka family which controlled Shiga County and Kurita County of south Omi Province for generations.

sen.cmt: the headの方が良いと思います。
sen.e: He was the head of Yamaoka family which controlled Shiga County and Kurita County of south Omi Province for generations.

sen.j: 山岡景就の子として生まれる。
sen.e: He was born as a son of Kagenari YAMAOKA.
He was born as the son of Kagenari YAMAOKA.
sen.cmt: the sonの方が良いと思います。
sen.e: He was born as the son of Kagenari YAMAOKA.

sen.j: 六角氏綱に仕え、瀬田城を居城にして江南の旗頭と呼ばれるほどの実力を保持していたといわれた。
sen.e: He served Ujitsuna ROKKAKU and with Seta Castle as his head-quarter, he boasted his military influence and was called the leader of the south Omi.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文例外対処
sen.e: He served Ujitsuna ROKKAKU, resided in Seta-jo Castle and was called the leader of the south Omi because he had a strong influence there.
sen.cmt: 文を自然にするため、全体を修正しました。指示書に従い、Seta-jo Castleに変更しました。
sen.e: He served Ujitsuna ROKKAKU, resided in Seta-jo Castle and was called the leader of the south Omi because he had a strong influence there.

sen.j: 六角氏のもとで多くの軍功を挙げてその地位を確立した。
sen.e: He had many military successes as a vassal of Rokkaku clan and established his status.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文例外対処
sen.e: He had many military successes as a vassal of the Rokkaku clan and established his status.
He had many military successes as a vassal of the Rokkaku clan and established his status.

sen.j: 景之の後は、嫡男の山岡景隆が継いだ。
sen.e: After Kageyuki, his legitimate son Kagetaka YAMAOKA continued his line.
After Kageyuki, his legitimate son Kagetaka YAMAOKA continued his bloodline.
sen.cmt: bloodlineの方が良いと思います。
sen.e: After Kageyuki, his legitimate son Kagetaka YAMAOKA continued his bloodline.

sen.j: 山岡氏は六角氏の有力家臣で、青地氏・馬淵氏らとともに守護六角氏の軍事力の中心を担っていた。
sen.e: Yamaoka clan was the influential vassals of Rokkaku clan, and together with Aochi clan and Mabuchi clan, it was in charge of military affairs for the military governor, Rokkaku clan.
The Yamaoka clan was the influential vassals of the Rokkaku clan and was in charge of military affairs as the military governor together with the Aochi clan and the Mabuchi clan.
sen.cmt: 文を自然にするため、全体を修正しました。
sen.e: The Yamaoka clan was the influential vassals of the Rokkaku clan and was in charge of military affairs as the military governor together with the Aochi clan and the Mabuchi clan.
